utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey you guys!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, figuring out our wedding plans.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's funny, we were doing the same thing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's really crazy! The hall, the dress, the food... I-I had no idea how expensive this stuff was!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah it is really pricey. I mean, I freaked when I first heard the numbers.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So what did you two do about it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It was pretty simple actually, I came up with a couple of cost-cutting solutions, wrote out a list and Monica told me to go to hell.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There's no way around it Pheebs, you just gonna have to accept the fact that this is gonna cost you a lot of money.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I heard that weddings are like a 40 billion dollar a year industry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, and I'm responsible for just like half of that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But really, it does seem like this money could be put to better use?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Now, how would you feel if we gave all the wedding money to charity and we just got married at City Hall?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I think it would make me wanna marry you even more.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I've got to say you guys, that's an incredible gesture!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe you do that next time you get married!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no. The next time it's gonna be a Hawaii at sunset. But maybe the time after that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our adoption social worker is coming by today so we are cleaning the apartment.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know you don't want me to help. You can't have it both ways!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, is this person who decides whether or not you... get a baby?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kind of. She's coming by to interview us and see where we live.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And it has to go perfectly, because if she doesn't like something about us she can keep us off every adoption list in the state.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, maybe I should stop by! She could be a soap opera fan! It's very impressive when the little people know a celebrity.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Little people?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Celebrity.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, so I think I'm just about done here, unless you have any bad stuff hidden somewhere, like... porn or cigarettes?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What...? NO!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't, and I'm offended by the insinuation!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, so there's not a magazine under the couch, or a pack of cigarettes taped to the back of the toilet tank, or a filthy video in the VCR?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll admit to the cigarettes and the magazine, but that tape is not mine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It isn't mine!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I guess we'll never know whose it is!

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: May I help you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes. We're here to make a rather sizeable donation to the children.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Well, any contribution, large or small, is always appreciated.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I think you're gonna appreciate it the crap out of this one

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Well, this is very generous!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And we don't want any recognition. This is completely anonymous.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Completely anonymous. From two kind strangers.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mr. X and Phoebe Buffay.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Well if you like, we can include your names in our newsletter.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Not necessary.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Buffay is spelled B-U-F-F-A-Y.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: And "X" is spelled uhm... "Mike Hannigan".

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Right. Well, on behalf of the children: thank you both very much.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure, I so glad we did this. It feels so good!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: It does. It feels really good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, look! And we get these free t-shirts!

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Oh, actually, that's the shirt I wore to the gym.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mhm... it's moist.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Emma will be up in a minute!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, good!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh hey Ross... Listen, I heard about you and Charlie. I'm really sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that's OK. I'm sure there are tons of other beautiful paleontologists out there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Absolutely.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There was one! She's it! All the rest look like they should live under a bridge!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So, uhm... what are you gonna do today?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I was thinking of taking Emma to the playground!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, what!?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Like I said I was thinking of taking Emma to the museum of knives and fire!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, look, Ross. I do not want Emma going to the playground.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Be-caaauuuse...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, well, if you must know... I had a traumatic... swing incident... when I was little.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I was 4 years old and I was on the swing and then all of a sudden my hair got tangled in the chain. And to get me out my mom had to-had to cut a big chunk of my hair! And it was uneven for weeks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And you made it through that? I wonder who's gonna play you in the movie!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, fine! You can make fun of me. I do not want Emma going there. And I was thinking Claire Danes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I'm sorry to hear about your tragedy, ok? But the swings are perfectly safe, and besides Emma loves them. You know what, you should come with us and you'll see!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, those things go like 40 miles an hour! Ok? When you're... and there is that moment when you are at the top, when you just don't know if you're gonna return back to earth!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Space is filled with orbiting children. Look, please, just come on, you know, when you see the look on Emma's face, I swear you won't regret it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good, you don't want to be one of those mothers who pass on their irrational fears on their children, do you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Irrational, huh? All right, well, I'll remember that the next time you freak out about a spider in your apartment!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, that's the same, I am sure there are thirty different species of poisonous swings!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, the adoption lady is early!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok, ok, here we go.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here we go. Stand up straight. Big smile.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello, is this the creepy residence?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're waiting for the adoption lady, but, hey, I'm glad you're here. I was cleaning this morning and I found this . I don't know if you wanna use it, but…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Awe, this is so sweet of you! But you know what? I won't be needing a veil, I actually won't be wearing a dress at all!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I told you! I am not coming to a naked wedding!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no, no, we're not having a big reception, we took the money we were gonna spend on a wedding and we donate them to the children charity.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's crazy! . I am sorry. I just can't imagine giving up my one wedding day like that!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We, you know, we're different! We don't care about having a huge party. This is really nice for you, but, oh, please, I put this on? And, ow, I look , why, well, radiant. All right, well, who cares, I don't need a pretty veil and a fancy dress.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's right. You're making a commitment and that's the same, whether you do that at the Plaza or, where are you gonna do it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: City Hall.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ow! Oh, that sounds nice! I am just there for jury duty. They really spruce that place up!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's ok, it's ok. I made my decision. What I really want is a great big wedding

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But you already gave all your money to charity!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I'll just ask for it back!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't think you can do that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why not! This is her wedding day, this is way more important than some stupid kids!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's sweet, honey, but save something for the adoption Lady.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, careful.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Careful, watch her hair. WATCH HER HAIR!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, she's got like three hairs!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know but they're just so beautiful! Oh, my God, I just pulled one out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I promise you she's safe! No watch how much she loves this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Here we go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, careful, ok. Oh, she's smiling! Oh my God, she does like it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: See, I told you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Awe! Oh my God! Looks, she's a little dare-devil! Oh, let me push, can I push?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, absolutely!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok. Oh God. Get the camera, it's in the diaper bag.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok! See? Scared of swings, I bet you feel pretty silly Ow!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: We're seriously asking for our money back?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's for our wedding day! Right, now, is this guy gay or straight, because one of us gonna have to start flirting.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Wow! Are you here to make another donation the same day? I don't think that that's ever happened before.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: The donation we made earlier, we k…, we w…, we want it back.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. See, that money was for a big wedding, that we thought we didn't want, but it turns out we do.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: So you're asking us to refund your donation to the children?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Yeah! This feels really good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I am sorry. I am, but this wedding is just really important to me.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Hey, it's not my business, besides it's probably a good thing. We really would have been spoiling the children, all those food, and warm clothing…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, that's not fair! A person's wedding is important! And especially to me! Ok? I didn't have a graduation party! And I didn't go to Prom. And I spent my sweet sixteen being chased round a tire yard by an escaped mental patient who is his own words wanted to “kill me” or whatever. So I deserve a real celebration and I am not gonna let some sweaty little man make me feel badly about it.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: She could have been talking about either one of us.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Hi, I am Laura, I am here for your adoption interview.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, I am Monica and this is Chandler. Please come in.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Would you like something to drink?

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Oh, water would be fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok. Great. I am so glad that you are here. We're really excited about getting this process started.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, because we love kids. Love ‘em to death.Well, not actually to death, that's just a figure of speech - we love kids the appropriate amount... as allowed by law.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Your place is just lovely.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ah, thank you. This building does have a wholesome family feel to it.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: You know, I... I feel like I've been here before. Are any other couples in the building adopting?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is that that couple on the first floor? Because we should get a baby before them. Yeah! That guy tried to sell me drugs.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But other than that... wholesome, wholesome building.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Oh...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: I just realized why I remember this place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really? What is it?

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Oh, it's nothing. I went on a date with a guy who lived in this building and it didn't end very well.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh... that wouldn't by any chance be... Joey Tribbiani?

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Of course it was!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Yeah, we had a really great night and in the morning he promised he would call me and he didn't.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: RAT BASTARD!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: So you're not friends with him?

utterance.speaker: Monica and Chandler
utterance.content: OH GOD NO! Nope, no, no, no. No! No, no. Nope! No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. NO! No!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Well, I'm sorry I brought it up. So, are either one of you planning on staying at home with your child...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hellooo? Anybody in there order a celebrity? OW!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: What was that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, it's just some crazy guy who roams the halls here. He's great with kids though.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, oh Ross, oh my God, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: SON OF A BITCH! Oh relax! I didn't say the 'F' word!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, see! I told you, those swings are evil! Alright, that is it. That is the last time Emma is getting on one of those things for her entire life.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No, no, no, no, okay, it wasn't the swing's fault. It was my fault and kind of that kids fault. Who is still laughing. Nice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, c'mon, please. Can we just get out of here, before somebody else gets hurt?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No wait, okay, okay, I have an idea. I want you to get on the swing, okay? And you'll see that there's nothing to be afraid of.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know what this is all about... You've always been jealous of my hair.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I just think you're an adult, okay? And you should get over your silly fears.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright fine. I'll do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: If you hold a spider.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: WHAT? WHERE? WHERE?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: IF you hold a spider.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Guys? Everything ok? It's me, Joe...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA......AAAaaa-doption!!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, just like I said. That crazy... Bert... roaming the halls.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Guys!?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Keep on roaming Bert! We don't want any crazy today!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: WE'LL TALK TO YOU LATER, BERT. EVERYTHNG'S FINE!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Everything doesn't sound fine!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Is he alright out there by himself?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah! He has a caretaker. His older brother... Ernie.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Bert and Ernie!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You can't make this stuff up!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You never told me about that guy on your sweet sixteen. Oh, ugh. I'm sorry about that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! It ended okay. One of my friends shot him.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Well, hey, at least you're getting a proper wedding. I mean, you really deserve that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I really do. You know, I had nothing growing up. Just like the kids I took the money from.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: No! No, no. I see where this is going. Don't make me go back there.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, I can't have a wedding with this money now. It's tainted.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Alright, fine. We'll give the money back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And if that guy at the charity gives us a hard time, my friend hasn't shot anyone in a really long time.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Well, I must say, this seems like a lovely environment to raise a child in.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, by the way, you are more than welcome to look under any of the furniture, because, believe me, you won't find any porn or cigarettes under there!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Oh! Well, actually, before we look around, let me make sure I have everything I need up to here...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't I show you the baby's room?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What the hell are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you wouldn't let me in, so I thought you were in trouble.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, we're not.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But you called me 'Bert'!? That's our code word for danger!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We don't have a code word.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We don't? We really should. From now on, 'Bert' will be our code word for danger.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So that was the baby's room.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What room should we see next?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Any room that isn't behind this couch!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Some people don't get him, but I think he's really funny! .

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I did not care for that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You have to get out of here. You slept with our social worker and you never called her back and she is still pissed, so she can't see you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, ok!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I forgot my bat.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And for the last time, we do not want to be friends with you! And we don't want to buy your bat!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bert! Bert! Bert! Bert!

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Are you friends with him?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can explain... Joey...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhm... ok... uhm... Well, yeah... You have got some nerve, coming back here. I can't believe you never called me.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh... yeah... Probably you don't even remember my name. It's Joey, by the way. And don't bother telling me yours, because I totally remember it... lady. Yeah! I waited weeks for you to call me.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: I gave you my number, you never called me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no! Don't try to turn this around on me, ok? I'm not some kind of... social work, ok, that you can just... do.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Well, I'm pretty sure I gave you my number.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? Think about it. Come on! You're a beautiful woman, smart, funny, we had a really good time, huh? If I had your number, why wouldn't I call you?

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: I don't know... Well, maybe I'm wrong... I'm sorry...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, hey, no! Too late for apologies... ok? You broke my heart. You know how many women I had to sleep with to get over you?

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Joey, wait!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: NO! I waited a long time, I can't wait anymore...

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: I'm sorry that you had to see that. I'm so embarrassed...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that's really ok.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, that we totally understand. Dating is hard.

utterance.speaker: Laura
utterance.content: Boy, you people are nice... And I've got to say... I think you're going to make excellent parents.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: LAURA!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We're back!

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Are you here to take more money? Because, I think what you're looking for is an ATM.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: No, no, we're here to give the money back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, because you know what, it's... it's all about the children.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Although... it's also about the wedding... Ugh, alright... here. No... Oh God... Oh!

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: If I haven't said so already sir, congratulations!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Ok, look! Enough! Alright? I'm stepping in. I'm putting my foot down! As your future husband I'm going to make this decision for us. Now... what do you think we should do?

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: You know what? It's not your decision anymore.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: On behalf of the Children of New York, I reject your money.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But... but... but we're giving you this!

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Yeah... And I'm giving it back to you... Come on! Consider it a contribution.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, this is very generous!

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Please, take the check, go have a great wedding and a wonderful life together.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Well, I mean... It sounds good to me. And that way we can save up, come back in a few years and make an even bigger donation.

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: Absolutely! And when you do, make sure you ask for Brian.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, is that you?

utterance.speaker: Charity guy
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello...? Oh hi... Oh my God...! Really...? I can't wait to tell Chandler... Ok, goodbye.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wrong number?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It was Laura... She gave us a great report and we are officially on the waiting list.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Now we just have to wait for a call and... and someone tells us there's a baby waiting for us. Oh...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello...? Have you seen Joey's bat?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok... I got a spider. There were two, I picked the bigger one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This feels perfectly normal. Ok, get on the swing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: whoo... ok... wow... ok... OH!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: See?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: A-alright! I can do this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There you go! Good for you! And you know what, I'm actually getting used to this little guy. I don't really even feel him in here anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That's because he's on your neck.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well... Whaa... aaah... aaahhh...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: ROSS!
